title: The Panama Canal
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,525 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 960L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Z1 and Z2
description: Celebrated as one of the modern wonders of the world, the Panama Canal forever changed trade and travel in the Americas. The Panama Canal provides students a look at the obstacles and triumph in completing this engineering feat. The book can also be used to teach students how to understand cause-and-effect relationships and the proper use of prepositional phrases. The books and lesson are available for levels Z1 and Z2.
highFrequencyWords: canal, channel, commerce, engineering, ingenuity, investment, isthmus, locks, malaria, morale, treaty, trek
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Prepositional Phrases                : Recognize and use prepositional phrases
awareness: Synonyms and Antonyms                : Identify and understand synonyms and antonyms
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
